text: (n) sabaq alkalam ealaa alhrwf almqtet fi 'awal surat albqr. 'uqsim allah bialqalam aldhy yaktub bih almalayikat walnas, wabima yaktubun min alkhayr walnfe walelwm. ma 'ant -ayha alrswl- bsbb niemat allah ealayk balnbwt walrsalt bdeyf aleql, wala sfyh alray, wa'iina lak ealaa ma tlqah min shdayd ealaa tblygh alrisalat lathwabana ezymana ghayr manqus wala mqtwe, wa'iinak -ayha alrswl- lela khalaq ezym, wahu ma ashtml ealayh alquran min mkarm alakhlaq; faqad kan amtthal alquran sjyt lah yatmr bamrh, wayantahi eamaa ynha enh
